titleStmt.title: A proclamation against breakinge or defacing of monumentes of antiquitie, beyng set up in churches or other publique places for memory and not for supersticion
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Rycharde Iugge and Iohn Cawood, Printers to the Quenes Maiestie,
